name: User Commands
author: User Commands Plugin
description: Allow privileged viewers (VIP, Tier 2/3 subs, mods) to create, edit, and delete custom chat commands.
keywords: commands, chat, twitch, custom, vip, subscriber

config.settings_tutorial:
---
### User Commands Plugin
This plugin allows privileged viewers to create their own chat commands.

**Who can create commands:**
- VIPs
- Tier 2 Subscribers
- Tier 3 Subscribers
- Moderators

**Usage:**
- `!command add <name> <response>` - Create a command
- `!command edit <name> <response>` - Edit a command
- `!command delete <name>` - Delete a command
- `!command list` - List all commands

**Supported Variables:**
- `{displayName}` - Display name of user
- `{username}` - Username of user
- `{channel}` - Channel name
- `{game}` - Current game
- `{title}` - Stream title
---
config.actions_tutorial:
---
### Manage Command
Use this action with Chat Match to handle `!command add/edit/delete/list` messages.

### Execute Command
Use this action with Chat Match to execute custom commands when viewers type them.
